attributes.action: Keep our school swimming pool open!
attributes.background: Mundesley infant school have decided after many years to close the school pool stating that the government funding for it has been stopped meaning that can no longer afford the upkeep on the pool. They never even considered asking the perants to help out with funds for support

rejection.details:
This is a decision for the school, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could raise this with the school's governing body.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/209300
